sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:45:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. 2. Add chopped onion, minced garlic, minced ginger, and chopped green chili. Cook until onions are translucent. 3. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 4. Stir in garam masala, turmeric powder, red chili powder, cumin powder, and coriander powder. Cook for 2-3. 5. Add cubed lamb and cook until browned. 6. Stir in yogurt and simmer for 30-35, until lamb is tender and sauce is thickened. 7. Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with rice or naan.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Indian">8f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afcf</cuisine> <diet/> <effort/> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Rogan Josh</name> <nutrition>Calories: 450, Protein: 25g, Fat: 30g, Carbs: 15g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Chop onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, and green chili.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:30:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ce5917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afd8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
